message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of significant value to you.  While I can't disclose all the details right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. This represents a substantial opportunity, and I believe it will be mutually beneficial. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up, but I'd prefer to work with you. Let me know your thoughts.
